content: in honour of the recent release of kirby s epic yarn here s a pattern for an epic kirby made of yarn i was going to make a bunch of different super smash brothers hats for him but got distracted and let him languish kirby was not amused and demanded to be published immediately so here he is patterns for a super mario kirby hat and a peach kirby crown are included i may come up with some more hats and post in the future
